title: Job 25:1
text: THEN answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

title: Job 25:2
text: Dominion and fear are with him, he maketh peace in his high places.

title: Job 25:3
text: Is there any number of his armies?  and upon whom doth not his light arise?

title: Job 25:4
text: How then can man be justified with God?  or how can he be clean that is born of a woman?

title: Job 25:5
text: Behold even to the moon, and it shineth not; yea, the stars are not pure in his sight.

title: Job 25:6
text: How much less man, that is a worm?  and the son of man, which is a worm?
